sections.heading: of damages; effect upon right of action
sections.text: A recovery of damages by virtue of this chapter, against a party, who shall have made a return to a writ of mandamus, is a bar to any other action against the same party for the making of such return.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 655, p. 509;R.S.1913, § 8281;C.S.1922

25-2166.Recovery of damages; effect upon right of action.

A recovery of damages by virtue of this chapter, against a party, who shall have made a return to a writ of mandamus, is a bar to any other action against the same party for the making of such return.

SourceR.S.1867, Code § 655, p. 509;R.S.1913, § 8281;C.S.1922, § 9234;C.S.1929, § 20-2166;R.S.1943, § 25-2166.
